body_html: The issue is related to a new feature request (added option to deal with ties in in_top_k op). Is the feature requested in #10767 part of the latest tensorflow? I cloned the latest tensorflow version from github and could not find the change. Just wondering if anyone has implemented the changes done by @nolanliou and others and became successful to add handle_ties argument to the in_top_k op.
body_text: The issue is related to a new feature request (added option to deal with ties in in_top_k op). Is the feature requested in  #10767  part of the latest tensorflow? I cloned the latest tensorflow version from github and could not find the change. Just wondering if anyone has implemented the changes done by @nolanliou and others and became successful to add handle_ties argument to the in_top_k op.
body: The issue is related to a new feature request (added option to deal with ties in _in_top_k_ op). Is the feature requested in  #10767  part of the latest tensorflow? I cloned the latest tensorflow version from github and could not find the change. Just wondering if anyone has implemented the [changes](https://github.com/nolanliou/tensorflow/commit/681724f94e025bbd8377c5406eec4047d58fc31b) done by @nolanliou and others and became successful to add _handle_ties_ argument to the _in_top_k_ op.
